These . will both be necessary parts of working for myself, which I want to do, eventually.” And, of course, for Allen there is the enjoyment of reading and writing; the break from engineering classes. ”It’s nice to sit down and havt to read a book.” Allen said. “That’s not to say English is a bed of roses, though.
